name: trial
title: How long is the free Embarkable trial?
description: Your free trial will last for 15 days from the time you start it.

name: credit
title: Is a credit card required for a free trial?

name: billing
title: When will I be charged?
description: Your account will be charged each month based on the start date of your paid plan.

name: cancel
title: How do I cancel my Embarkable subscription?
description: You may cancel your plan at any time. Once a plan is cancelled, we cancel all future billing. Your account will then be suspended at the end of your current billing cycle.

name: privacy
title: Do you sell my data?
description: No. Your data is yours. We will never share, sell or monetize your data in any way.

name: security
title: Is my data secure?
description: Yes, Secure login and end to end SSL encryption ensure your data is secure.  While multi-zone backup and over 99% uptime ensures your ready to go

name: cloud
title: Do I need to download or install any software to use Embarkable?
description: No. Embarkable is accessed from any web browser and all data is stored securely in the cloud.
